name: Javva Juice
description: Adventure little wizard named Javva, looking for his Coffee stolen by evil skeleton King. Enjoy challenging gameplay - then Javva Juice for you! Here you have to work hard to be like before you go through the next dungeon!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 Processor: Intel x86 CPU Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Opengl 2.1+ GPU (256MB VRAM) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 1.7 Ghz Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 250 MB available space
